Gesper looked pleased.
Gesper: Finally! Indeed, I wish to speak with you. I am Gesper, 
Tripredacus strategist and tactician, as well as bearer of a link to 
the Matrix. We have recently arrived onplanet and wish to know who our 
neighbors are, and to whom we may give our trust.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The water in front of Gesper began to rise slowly, then gave away,
> splashing all over as the large all terrain millitary vehicle that 
is
> Pacifix began to drive up the beach. He had two white flags tied to 
his
> cannons. He stopped several paces away from the Tripred, then the 
back
> part of the vehicle seperated, as the front part leapt up into the 
air,
> transforming into the Autobots leader. Pacifix turned to Gesper, and
> picked out his two freeze cannons, throwing them to the sand in 
front of
> him, then looking back up. 
> 
> "I hear you want to speak to the Autobots."
